WorkItem.Description:
I would like to see a code sample that demonstrates the whole WPF drag & drop process, beginning from the DragDrop.DoDragDrop method and ending in providing the target object with data. I would like to see the following:
1. Detection of a drag operation - how does the developer detect that a drag operation has started and knows to call the DragDrop.DoDragDrop method
2. Changing cursors depending on the drop target
3. Providing data to the drop target
